ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Box, & FREE 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
16 Cameras:  Outdoor/Indoor IR dome camera, 1/4" Aptina CMOS Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 850 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs. Low Illumination Color: 0.02Lux, B&W;: 0.002Lux. Vandal resistant & water proof
16 Channel DVR with 4TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs, Support CDRW/DVD-RW, 2 USB ports for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Enterprice CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 16 Channel DVR 4TB HDD 960H & D1 Real-Time 30fps Recording Support CDRW/DVD-RW, 16 Cameras 850 TV Lines 2.8~12mm Vari-Focal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
